data.title: Legit, Mission, CEO salary
data.meta_description: Learn about Hackley School: Is it legit? Do I like the mission? What is the CEO's salary?
data.text:
Hackley School is a legitimate nonprofit organization registered as a 501(c)(3) entity. Hackley School submitted a form 990, which is a tax form used by tax-exempt organizations in the U.S., indicating its operational transparency and adherence to regulatory requirements. Donations to this organization are tax deductible.

Here are some key statistics you may want to consider:

Executive Compensation: $1,183,993

Professional Fundraising Fees: $0

Other Salaries and Wages: $21,188,980

For more financial information, click here

Official website here: www.hackleyschool.org

Impact

This information is meant to be a general summary of Hackley School . Please take the time to review official sources before making any decisions based upon the content provided here.

Thursday, August 15, 2024

Hackley School has a significant impact on the educational landscape, providing a high-quality college preparatory education for boys and girls from kindergarten through 12th grade. With a mission focused on academic excellence and character development, Hackley School plays a crucial role in shaping the future leaders of tomorrow. Through its commitment to providing financial aid grants to deserving students, the school also ensures that its impact reaches a diverse range of learners, contributing to a more equitable society. Located in Tarrytown, NY, Hackley School stands as a pillar of educational excellence in the region, shaping minds and inspiring individuals to reach their full potential.
